hand the liftoff distance is 1 to 1.5

it's all you really need for most games
and more than enough for csgo where

acceleration and it just feels
responsive and that's really it so in

bright the build quality is suspect at
times and the price seems a bit too high
but the three year warranty is
impressive the tracking performance is
amazing second to nothing else that I've
tried and it's the lightest Mouse in the
category so if you want something that
simply performs the final most might be
your final mouse
